extendedInfo.description: Little mix are a hot young British four-piece girl group formed in 2011, consisting of members Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, and Jade Thirlwall. Little Mix have been branded the next Spice Girls as well as the UK's next biggest girl group capable of international success. Enjoy this amazing free Live wallpaper of Little Mix!Features High quality ainmated wallpaper ImagesSettings available to adjust speed of the wallpaper animationWallpaper is formated to fit both cellphone and tablet screensAll Wallpapers by Eliteapps are free for all to use.In order to offer this free service, we must support our wallpapers with ads, which for the most part,are from premium vendors and other highly rated app publishers across the market.
